channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street light not working again following recent fix., 23rd April
item.description:
Street light between 10 and 12 Argyll Road is not working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Argyll Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tremblant Close sign is broken and being held together with tape, 23rd April
item.description:
Entrance to Tremblant Close
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Tremblant Close, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign bracket is hanging/fallen off (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 23rd April
item.description:
28day with give and take plus temporary footway closure please lift and relay x1 900 x 150 x 30mm sunken kerb stone stats required (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 23rd April
item.description:
NWD with give and take make safe with x4 1m barriers and x4 sandbags and place around damaged bollard in grass verge (Damaged Street Furniture)
